question: A typical IR spectrum can be divided into two regions 600 to 1400cm^-1 (right portion) and 1400 to 4000cm^-1 left portion) , the right portion of the spectrum is called
The O-H group in alcohol and carboxylic acids show at:

answers.a: Alcohol at 3300cm^-1 and carboxylic acid at 3000cm^-1
answers.c: Alcohol at 3000cm^-1 and carboxylic acid at 3300cm^-1
